extendedInfo.description: Reversi (also known as Othello) is a much-loved classic strategy game, often described as taking only a minute to learn, but a lifetime to master. Each game only takes a few minutes to play, making it an ideal game on the move for your android phone.

reviews.title: Best Reversi on the Market
reviews.comment: Great game play, easy UI and settings, and lets you rewind and replay your game any number of moves. Awesome for learning and improving. Several difficulty levels to find a match for anyone. Only problem is that the scoreboard automatically resets itself. Doesn\'t really matter though.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: will test you
reviews.comment: plays well so you can lose if you don\'t concentrate. Unusual strategy. Recommended
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Deep Green Reversi
reviews.comment: This app works very well and looks very nice, but I can\'t get it to keep score and when I try to save a game so I can go back to it later I can never find it. How do you find your saved games and why doesn\'t it keep score for me?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good progessive AI. Challenging, but mostly beatable on \"advanced\", wins 90% on \"expert\", \"master\" lives up to the name ! But I\'m just a novice ...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: AI is ridiculously difficult, even on so-called \"beginner\" level.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Runs well, but difficulty needs to be adjusted. Freezing the board is an advanced tactic that the computer should not be using in beginner mode-DroidX
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good game Powerful engine, one of the most challenging I\'ve seen short of zebra and nboard.Has some flaws, stupid mistakes even on master
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Well done game. Excellent graphics. Good levels of difficulty. A keeper, for sure.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Challenging, AI is hard even on easy. That\'s what make it such a great game. There\'s even an undo and redo button too.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The game is hard but I beat the com in about 4 tries. If it was easy then what\'s the point in doing it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Adequate. But there\'s no sound when making a move. Otherwise not bad. -HTC Rhyme.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great a.i. for experienced players.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Computer always wins. Boring...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Best looking Othello game out there. As hard as Michael Jackson on a visit to a kindergarten! The ad banner is a tad annoying.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Would give 5 stars, but no matter how many times I win, my score either eventually depletes, remains the same, or goes back 2 zero -Droid Incredible
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I am so good at this game irl. But you cannot win against this computer even in easy. It predicts the best possible move in all situations, always.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This game cheats!...why does my turns only turn 1-3 and the computer turns 3-8 at a time ....CHEATING
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: umm idk if I just suck horribly, or the computer is programed to not let the player EVER win
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It\'s good but even on beginer i always get creamed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: For real reversi players. The best AI\'d one on android.
reviews.author: A Google User
